FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Database Attributes Request Message that was processed. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/Keep Alive, 3: Successful Completion, 4: Failed Completion, 5: Invalid Request)

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Useful to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: ATTRIBUTE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the type of Database Attributes for the first mnemonic to be returned. Value is 2: Text conversion

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status of the mnemonic: valid mnemonic or valid mnemonic with no data or invalid mnemonic (1: Valid, 2: Valid, No data, 3: Invalid

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.NUM-OF-TEXT-SETS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of Text Conversion sets defined for this mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.TEXT-SET.1.LOW-RANGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Low range for text conversion set 1 for mnemonic 1

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.1.TEXT-SET.1.HIGH-RANGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: High range for text conversion set 1 for mnemonic 1
